isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLES: SPICER J400-S, W460-S - DISASSEMBLE - DIFFERENTIAL

step1.para: Match mark differential case halves with punch or chisel for correct alignment in reassembly ( Figure 41).

figure.caption: Figure 41. Match Mark Differential Case Halves

step1.para: Remove differential case bolts and lift off the right hand case half ( Left, Figure 42).

figure.caption: Figure 42. Left Off Right Hand Case Half, and Remove Thrust Washer and Differential Side Gear

step1.para: Remove thrust washer and differential side gear ( Right, Figure 42).
Lift out cross shaft, pinion mates and thrust washers ( Figure 43).

figure.caption: Figure 43. Lift Out Cross Shaft, Pinion Mates and Thrust Washers

step1.para: Remove second differential side gear and thrust washer ( Figure 44).

figure.caption: Figure 44. Remove Differential Side Gear and Thrust Washer

step1.para: If differential side bearings are to be replaced, remove old bearings using suitable puller ( Figure 45).

figure.caption: Figure 45. Remove Old Differential Side Bearings

note.para: Inspect all parts, including the machined surfaces of case itself.

important.para: If any gears are to be replaced, they must be replaced in sets. Inspect thrust washers for scoring and excessive wear. Replace all worn or damaged parts.

step1.para: When it is necessary to remove ring gear from differential case, carefully center punch each rivet head. Use a 9/16 inch drill bit for the J Model carrier rivets and an 11/16 inch drill bit for the W Model carriers. Drill through rivet heads ( Figure 46). Next, use a rounded type punch to drive out the remaining portion of the rivet.

caution.para: Do not use a chisel to remove rivet heads, as damage to differential case may result ( Figure 47).

figure.caption: Figure 47. Do Not Use Chisel to Remove Rivet Heads

caution.para: Always use a soft metal hammer or H.D. plastic head hammer to strike punch.

warning.para: Wear safe eye protection. Do not hit steel parts with a steel hammer. Parts can break and cause injury.

step1.para: When re-installing ring gear to differential, use hydraulic press and suitable riveting fixture as shown ( Figure 48). Pressure requirement per rivet is 45 to 50 U.S. tons or 41 to 45 metric tons.

figure.caption: Figure 48. Re-Install Ring Gear to Differential
